projects.name: Convolutional Neural Network
projects.description: A Convolutional Neural Network (or short: CNN) is used for Object Detection within Images. I've developed my own object-oriented CNN using Java and decided to make it an Open-Source Project. You can have a Look at my Code on the GitHub Repository.
projects.developmentTimespan: This Project has been in Development since March 2022 and is being updated (more or less) actively.

projects.name: 3D Printer
projects.description: This is custom-designed FDM 3D Printer running on Marlin Firmware. It has a Print Size of approximatley 14x14x20cm. All the Models are uploaded on the GitHub Repository.
projects.developmentTimespan: This Project was developed between November 2020 and March 2021.

projects.name: CoronaApp
projects.description: During the first Lockdown back in March 2020, I've read about the Development of a Smartphone App used for tracking Contact Persons using BlueTooth. Because it took quite a While until the official App was released, together with a Friend I've worked on our own Version which ended up to be very similar to the Original one.
projects.developmentTimespan: This project was developed between April and May 2020.

projects.name: IoT-capable Weatherstation
projects.description: The goal of this Project was to develop a Weatherstation capable to push it's Measurements into a Database, from where the Data could be pulled to be used on any other Device. You can have a Look at my Code on the GitHub Repository.
projects.developmentTimespan: This project was developed between November 2019 and March 2020. It's been updated again in July and August 2022 for a better Data Storage, so all Data could be used for training a Weather Forecast AI.
